item.title: [GROOVY-2376] A NumberFormatException occurs when starting the groovy console in the command line
item.description:

comments.comment:
It dues to the following code in line 11 of groovy.ui.view.WindowsDefaults.groovy:
if ((System.properties['os.version'] as Float) >= 6.0) {
...

While, in most cases, os.version will be 5.1 under windows XP, but there might be other build under any version of windows, e.g. , it's not very well to calculate os version in such a manner.

I just commeted the code in WindowsDefaults.groovy for my windowsXP to solve this bug.
Switched to a pattern matcher instead, as long as vista and Windows Server 2008 start with "6." we will be fine.
